ControlAIConversation.document: This example shows you how to use this API when you want the robot to proactively broadcast text.
ControlAIConversation.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ControlAIConversation
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": "1400000000",
    "SessionId": "6bb56a09-2787-40bc-80c5-dc6dab783eff",
    "Command": "ServerPushText",
    "ServerPushText": {
Hello, happy to serve you.
        "Interrupt": true
    }
}
ControlAIConversation.title: Send Broadcast Text

CreateAIAgentCall.document: This example shows you how to initiate an outbound call using AI Agent.
CreateAIAgentCall.title: Initiate an Outbound Call Using AI Agent

CreateAICall.document: This example simulates a hospital using a large model to conduct telephone follow-up surveys with the parents of patients discharged from surgery.
CreateAICall.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAICall
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Callee": "008612300000000",
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "SystemPrompt": "You are Dr. Li, a friendly and kind follow-up doctor at the People's Hospital, making a phone call to the parent of patient Xiao Ming."
    "WelcomeMessage": "Hello"
    "LLMType": "openai",
    "Model": "gpt-4o-mini",
    "APIKey": "sk-proj-xxxxx",
    "APIUrl": "https://api.openai.com/v1/",
    "VoiceType": "ZhiXi",
    "EndFunctionEnable": true
}
CreateAICall.title: Create an AI Call Example (Patient Follow-Up Scenario)

CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.document: Create Agent Cruise-style Outbound Call Task
CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000,
    "Name": "New energy SUV recommendation"
    "Callees": [
        "+8613012345678",
        "+8613012345679",
        "+8613012345670"
    ],
    "Callers": [
        "0086075586013388"
    ],
    "Agent": "foo@tencent.com",
    "ConcurrencyNumber": 3,
    "CallOrder": 0,
    "StartTime": 1708483433,
    "EndTime": 1708485433
}
CreateAgentCruiseDialingCampaign.title: Create Agent Cruising Outbound Call Task Instance

CreateCallOutSession.document: This example shows you how to trigger outbound calls through this API in the backend, without loading the front-end SDK. Currently, only outbound call back through the mobile end (first dialing the customer service mobile phone) is supported, and make sure that the addition of outbound call allowlist has been applied and passed.
CreateCallOutSession.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ccc.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCallOutSession
<Common request parameters>

{
    "IsForceUseMobile": "true",
    "Callee": "008612300000000",
    "UUI": "fooandbar",
    "UserId": "FooOrBar@tencent.com",
    "SdkAppId": 1400000000
}
CreateCallOutSession.title: Outbound Call API Call Example
